means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 古德费洛绰号，意气相投的伙伴，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“好+伙伴”(good+fellow)

sentence.Network_en: Gloria Goodfellow : You can't just kill people because you disapprove of them!
sentence.Network_cn: 洛里亚·德菲勒: 你不能因为别人与你的思想相左,就杀了他们 啊 !

sentence.Network_en: That shrewd and knavish sprite call'd Robin Goodfellow ( Shakespeare )
sentence.Network_cn: 那个叫作罗宾好伙计的精明而又顽皮的小 妖精.

PerfectNetExp.abs: goodenough 古迪纳夫, goodfellow 古德费洛, goodfeeling 好感

list.abs: nice to meet you , mrs goodfellow ., 很高兴见到你 , 古德凡乐太太.

auth_sentence.content: Dan Goodfellow is definitely one of the contenders.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dan Goodfellow is definitely one of the contenders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dan Goodfellow is definitely one of the contenders.
